none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on March 23, 2022 Description from Terminal Escape:
 It's one thing to just listen. It's something else to listen in a future context. To think that this 2008 recording from FAILING LIGHTS might have been a dark reflection on the past when it was created, but has turned into a brutally depressing soundtrack of the present...makes the very sonic weight so much more oppressive. I receive no joy from Combat Stance today, but that was never the intent. Listen, and you'll hear what I mean. COMBAT STANCE
https://failinglights.bandcamp.com/ https://blogger.googleusercontent.com/img/b/R29vZ2xl/AVvXsEj36-jAXJFautIZBu_z7yn56wj2bCCZmpi4woKDbJzn4urnCg-hfhGx5aZdPIIWrktbJt4fHJ70_fK5MOD0RP_CLDYnK4gkOnCk32qB3H01Q1o9Ui3DUWBqx4SyjTgAAag024kF8pOEP-U3W-tLl7-hrGXwN_Kl_HH0NFCECfw8XwhFRVWMGJhMbajhHw/s801/Failing%20img.jpg
